Beating yourself up - negative self-talk

People are imperfect. We think and behave irrationally, despite our best efforts. When anxious, frustrated, or overwhelmed by life, we do dumb things as a result...

Even worse, we then beat ourselves up for our shortcomings. A voice in our mind says: “you're useless and pathetic” or “you're a loser!” We give ourselves a kicking simply for getting things wrong. 

Perhaps we're trying to improve or change. But you would not use this strategy with family or friends; even strangers receive more respect. We may wish to get it right, but negative self-talk only derails us further.

There has to be a better way. Instead, speak to yourself with compassion and kindness. Remember that you were just a kid once. When you catch negative self-talk, take a big deep breath, apologise, and ask yourself: “Okay – nobody is perfect. How can we make it better next time?”

#motivation   #confidence   #selfimprovement   #confidencebuilding
